Text: Estimate of tax owing on April thPST Hi Geoff We have prepared an estimate of your taxes owing in the US April th given the information you have provided to us and recommend that you make a payment to the IRS on or before that date I will fax an extension form to you along with instructions as to where you should file it The extension if filed timely gives us until August th to submit your tax return to the IRS but we would like to have it completed by April th the Canadian filing deadline as we are also filing a Canadian tax return for you I believe we discussed this previously Please confirm that your fax number is and if you have any special instructions before I send the fax Thanks and kind regards Judy Wood PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary IAS Dept The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer
